article.title: Integrated Systems Supports Counter Explosive Device Effort
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Joint Improvised Explosive Device Defeat Organization

article.text: Integrated Systems, Ellicott City, Maryland, was recently awarded a $49 million contract to provide operational support services for the Joint Improvised Explosive Device Defeat Organization. Work will be performed in Arlington, Virginia, Afghanistan, and Iraq, with an estimated completion date of May 10, 2013. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
